email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel SEA HORIZON for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai.

Rate: USD 42 per MT on CIF terms.
Laycan: 25-30 September.
Demurrage: USD 20,000 per day.

Please let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
John Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you revise the rate to USD 38 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. The SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 220m. Given the current market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per MT.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 40 per MT is still higher than our target rate. We are considering alternative vessels offering USD 37 per MT. Can you match this rate?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

After further discussions with the owners, we can offer a final rate of USD 38 per MT. This is our best and final offer.

Please confirm your acceptance at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
John Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We accept the rate of USD 38 per MT. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
John Carter
